title: Here's a list of all the lore-stories that I could find
body:
This is an older version of the post.  The one that I'll be updating is now here:  http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/kJiEuXJA-a-list-of-every-story-i-could-find

I've sorted them by area or allegiance and listed the champions in the story. The stories labeled "Champion Pages" are unnamed stories that are found on a champion's page. I seriously doubt that these are all of the stories, so please put missing ones in the comments.
I know that some stories appear more than once. For example, Kalista's stories are under Shadow Isles AND Independent.

I only put things here if they are in story format, so no champion backstory, just actual stories.

Nice work!

some missing:

Illaoi is briefly in Burning tides too.  (pre-release even!)

Bilgewater missing TK spoken word thing.  (TK is the name and form it uses in Bilgewater)

Rek Sai has a story, Journal, and video.

Also Zed, Akali and Shen appear in Jhin's story.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

I'm well aware that pretty much all the _Journal of Justice_ stuff is pretty much non-canon now...except for one odd lore stickler.

{{champion:50}}  became Grand General of Noxus through the storyline in the _Journal of Justice_. It was a very involved storyline that spanned over the 3-4 years we had the JoJ, and it involved so many other champions and events (including a big one with introducing the Dominion map, which is now removed). It really seemed like the JoJ existed solely for that one lore guy to write the backstory of how Swain becomes Grand General, in real-time. Even his Tyrant skin was introduced as part of the JoJ conclusion with him taking power over Noxus in the very last issue. 

However, it's kinda accepted that the JoJ, especially any bits involving Summoners, is no longer canon. And the new canon is that Swain is still/always been the Grand General of Noxus now.

But his main lore on his Champion page remains unchanged. Assuming only the Summoner bit doesn't exist, he still doesn't 'start' as the Grand General of Noxus. The Sion Reborn Promo page also actually keeps the whole plotline in Kalamanda/Dominion **canon** because he and {{champion:7}} directly reference how she helped him (by pretending to be {{champion:59}} in their 'fight'). Also Boram Darkwill is still mentioned to have existed, and that Swain defeating Keiran Darkwill and attaining his position through that duel is still canon.

So I'm just really confused. At this point, is only some bits of Swain's old lore kept 'canon' till Riot knows what to do? And if so, like which bits?

Or no definite answer till his big VGU/revamp?

What about Ahri's story, Stray Fox? Is it not official yet, or was it just overlooked?
Link:http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Ahri/Background

I think it's not official yet. They were going to release it with the Ahri statue they made, but the statue wasn't to people's liking, so it got canned and that lore addition likely got put to the side in the process. 

It's very possible that it will come back as color lore when Riot updates the Ionian lore. When that would happen is anyone's guess, but a Rioter informed me that there are a few Ionian champs that need updates since they still mention the Institute of War, her's being one of them. So they are planning it, just not sure when that might be.
